F6FD065B80E449D0A42B5766CECC0246.description: I can use appropriate rehearsed behaviors and recognize some obviously inappropriate behaviors in familiar everyday situations.

19D587FF79054374B71AEFE07EB01DCA.description: I can communicate with others from the target culture in familiar everyday situations, using memorized language and showing basic cultural awareness.

47CD67347E534DB9AA024019E864E557.description: In my own and other cultures I can identify some typical practices related to familiar everyday life.C

55C6B22614E045A1A10DE6FFB2A80BF2.description: In my own and other cultures I can identify some typical products related to familiar everyday life.

9B495F5DB75141389E8A5B4F42A6956D.description: Cultural Communication: In my own and other cultures, I can identify products and practices to help me understand perspectives. I can interact at a survival level in some familiar everyday contexts.

53A6CE9375474C68BA35E862F156E5B6.description: I can present personal information about my life and activities, using simple sentences most of the time.

BFAD6F9ADDEA4FC38401B79CFD4FC27D.description: I can express my preferences on familiar and everyday topics of interest, using simple sentences most of the time.

A39E0024CC9343E2ABD81FEC347C6406.description: I can present on familiar and everyday topics, using simple sentences most of the time.

464FBBFEF9D1434AB3879196B36AA9E5.description: Presentational Communication: I can present information on both very familiar and everyday topics using a variety of practiced or memorized words, phrases, and simple sentences through spoken, written, or signed language.

75B7C92FA5F340D0B858A0A326CF06B8.description: I can request and provide information by asking and answering practiced and some original questions on familiar and everyday topics, using simple sentences most of the time.

C7842FF3A215489086700D57A7D977C4.description: I can interact with others to meet my basic needs related to routine everyday activities, using simple sentences and questions most of the time.

8D681C7A5E8647C8AA9E896CB73C2535.description: I can express, ask about, and react to preferences, feelings, or opinions on familiar topics, using simple sentences most of the time and asking questions to keep the conversation on topic.

9851C0D48181499B9F24E70B985CA0A0.description: Interpersonal Communication: I can communicate in spontaneous spoken, written, or signed conversations on both very familiar and everyday topics, using a variety of practiced or memorized words, phrases, simple sentences, and questions.

3718851F283447ECB40A21E50BD1B404.description: I  can identify the topic and some isolated facts from simple sentences in informational texts.

B9CF72C266C34ECDB9842B5752D648B4.description: I can identify the topic and some isolated elements from simple sentences in short fictional texts.

04938638C36C4CFE92A7EA000DC66F82.description: I can identify the topic and some isolated facts from simple sentences in informational texts.

21E5F119B35C42949B0C3F4079AA6F8E.description:
Interpretive Communication: I can identify the general topic and some basic information in both very familiar and everyday  contexts by
recognizing practiced or memorized
words, phrases, and simple sentences in
texts that are spoken, written, or signed.
